Comments_List: I learned how to conduct in-depth primary and secondary research, and how to condense content into a 50 page thesis.
I learned how to develop and execute a major independent research project.

I think the advisors should be evaluated because, as someone who ended up having two different advisors because my first one left Yale mid-year, I found that my second advisor was unhelpful and at times kind of rude towards me and my project. I also think that having two graders instead of one might eliminate any bias that might occur (related to feelings about the topic, the writing style, or even the student). 

For the first semester of the project, I think it might be beneficial to make the final assignment a 10 page draft, rather than a draft OR an outline. I think having a 10-page draft plus an outline of the remainder of my thesis was a lot more helpful than having just an outline.
early benchmark deadlines were super helpful in keeping us on track!
Requirement of the HSHM major, so you would have to write this. Yearlong allows for a more in-depth study of your material.
yes, writing a senior essay is so important
